name: Nike Air Max
description: This modern take on the classic Air Max 1 has a sleek build and lightweight construction.

name: Steve Madden Wafer Suede Heels
description: This sky-high stiletto heel sandal features a minimalist, strappy silhouette that gives both jeans and dresses a sleek appeal.

name: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star High Top
description: A simple design, a timeless silhouette, an unmistakable ankle patch, front lace-up fastening and flat rubber sole.

name: Reebok Club C Revenge
description: Shoes that match every challenge. The double outsole adds some height, and the leather upper keeps your look classic.

name: Nike Air Forces
description: An elegantly shaped and lifted midsole. The leather on the upper breaks in easily and ages to soft perfection while the sculpted collar and pillowy heel keep it comfy.

name: New Balance 550
description: This streamlined silhouette offers a clean take on the heavy-duty designs of the late â€˜80s. The leather, synthetic, and mesh upper construction is a classic look in any era.

name: Converse Chuck Taylor Run Star Hike Platform
description: A chunky platform and jagged rubber sole. A molded platform, two-tone outsole and rounded heel give off futuristic vibes.

name: Steve Madden Leopold Chelsea Boots
description: A lug sole updates a timeless Chelsea boot that will take you from the office to happy hour with casual-cool style. With a 1-1/2 inch heel.

name: Nike Blazer Mid '77
description: Delivers a timeless easy to wear design. Its crisp leather pairs with bold retro branding and luscious suede accents for a premium feel. Exposed foam on the tongue and a special midsole finish.

name: Michael Kors Perla Suede Block Heel Pumps
description: Crafted of suede leather, finished with a goldtone buckle closure and delicate logo charm. With a heel of about 2.25 inches and closed round toe.

name: Vans Sk8 Hi
description: This legendary high-top shoe's sturdy suede and canvas uppers allow for maximum attitude. Reinforced toe caps, supportive padded collars, and our signature rubber waffle outsoles.

name: Dr. Martens Jadon Boot
description: An 8-eye silhouette, built from DM's classic Polished Smooth leather and stacked on a PVC outsole. The Jadon boot is secured with yellow welt stitching and tagged with an AirWair heel loop.
